content: In 1632, he published a book that stated, among other things, that the heliocentric theory of Copernicus was correct. Galileo was once again called before the Inquisition and this time was found guilty of heresy.
translations: ita:Nel 1632 ha pubblicato un libro che affermava, tra le altre cose, che la teoria eliocentrica di Copernico era corretta
